nodes.text: A gunboat was a type of starship used by the Galactic Empire. The assault gunboat and the escort gunboat were classes of gunboat. An Imperial battle group located in the Ilum system utilized multiple gunboats.

Political governments located in the Unknown Regions used gunboats in their fleets. The Lioaoin Regime had one, as well as the Nikardun Destiny. The Watith species had a type of gunboat that was remotely piloted.
